alert.note: Alert for Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 5:00AM EST until January 11 at 8:18AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton MA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Massachusetts... Blackstone River At Northbridge affecting Worcester County. For the Blackstone River...including Northbridge, Woonsocket... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Blackstone River at Northbridge. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, This is a serious flood event. Flooding will spread into residences along the river on Main Street. Flooding will affect low lying areas from Northbridge to Millville. Buisnesses along the river should take the necessary actions to protect property along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:31 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 5.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 12.3 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 500 PM EST.
